TopicTitle: (solved) KSP JNSQ Void night sky and weird plume interactions issue

Articles.Content:
For some reason in JNSQ during  the night, the sky and atmosphere appears completely black, doesn't seem to be the sky box as in space and during the day it works as expected. Engine plumes seem to also disappear when in front of the void. I don't know if this is a problem with my install of JNSQ, a weird interaction with other mods or if I'm running on an unsupported build of KSP. (currently I am running the latest version of KSP. )

Images of the problems stated 

 

Edited March 11, 2023 by The guy from duna
Problem resolved, issue was due to JNSQ scatterer sunflare conflicting with another sunflare pack
